items.sentence: When I was younger, I thought I could do anything.
When they saw that they were losing, they gave up.
We watched the baby snuggling with her teddy bear.
Tom didn\'t know that Mary couldn\'t speak French.
I need to find something to open this bottle with.
I offered Tom a drink of vodka, but he refused it.
Tom was sitting in his car outside the restaurant.
Tom told me he couldn\'t wait to get out of there.
Tom told me that he doesn\'t use Facebook anymore.
Why don\'t you come to my house one of these days?
